ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is nothing but a Reminder to all the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is a reminder for all the peoples of the world,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It is nothing but Good Counsel for everyone in the world,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is certainly the guidance for all (jinn and mankind).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: That is but an advice to the entire creation!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, this is no less than a Reminder for the creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: It is naught but a reminder for the nations,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It is naught but a Reminder unto all beings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is naught else than a reminder unto creation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is merely a reminder to all mankind;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This is naught but an Admonition Unto the worlds-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is just a reminder for all the nations,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily this is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, this (the Quran) is no less than a Reminder to (all) the 'Alamin (mankind and jinns).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is nothing but a Reminder to the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is only a Reminder to all mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is not except a reminder to the worlds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [81:27] It is only a reminder, an admonition, for all worlds, [those of] mankind and jinn,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This is) i.e. the Qur'an (naught else than a reminder) an admonition from Allah (unto creation) the jinn and humankind,
